name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Tableau Analytics Lead - Aerospace Data Solutions
professional_summary: Bringing 10 years of experience across Insurance, Healthcare, Banking, and Consulting domains with focus on Tableau Desktop advanced dashboard development and SQL-driven data extraction for mission-critical analytics systems.

Architect interactive Tableau dashboards using calculated fields, LOD expressions, and parameters to transform complex aerospace data into actionable insights for executive decision-making and technical teams across DEV, QA, and PROD environments.

Build dimensional data models using star and snowflake schemas with Tableau Hyper extracts to optimize query performance for large-scale aerospace datasets while maintaining data accuracy through rigorous validation and testing protocols.

Configure Tableau Server administration including site setup, user role management, and row-level security implementation to govern Interactors and Viewers access patterns across functional teams and stakeholder groups.

Design ETL pipelines integrating SQL transformations with Tableau Prep workflows to cleanse, model, and prepare aerospace mission data from PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Oracle databases for real-time visualization and reporting needs.

Implement dashboard actions including filter, highlight, URL, and parameter interactions combined with sets and table calculations to enable dynamic cohort analysis and running totals for operational metrics tracking.

Coordinate release migrations across multi-environment deployments using workbook publishing best practices while maintaining version control and approval workflows for tier-1 support and troubleshooting scenarios.

Optimize Tableau performance through incremental refresh strategies, data extract tuning, and query optimization techniques to reduce dashboard load times and improve user experience for aerospace systems monitoring.

Establish data governance protocols integrating Collibra catalog with Tableau Data Management for metadata lineage tracking and compliance with manufacturing environment standards and regulatory requirements.

Facilitate requirements gathering sessions with business analysts and stakeholders to translate aerospace operational needs into technical specifications for dashboard development and data source connections.
Develop Python and R integration workflows to extend Tableau analytical capabilities with custom statistical models and predictive analytics for aerospace performance metrics and trend analysis.

Maintain dimensions and measures hierarchies with custom formatting, tooltips, and annotations to align with branding standards while ensuring intuitive navigation for executive leadership and technical teams.
Monitor usage metrics through Tableau REST API automation scripts written in PowerShell to track dashboard adoption patterns and identify optimization opportunities for mission-critical systems.

Apply joins, unions, and blending techniques to combine data from multiple aerospace data sources while preserving referential integrity and ensuring accurate cross-database analysis for decision support.
Execute context filters, dimension filters, measure filters, and top N filtering strategies to manage large aerospace datasets efficiently while maintaining responsive dashboard performance.
Configure live connections versus data extracts based on performance trade-off analysis for aerospace real-time monitoring systems versus historical trend analysis requirements.

Support Agile Scrum methodology participation including sprint planning, daily standups, and retrospectives while coordinating with DBAs, IT, and Tableau administrators for iterative dashboard enhancement.

Provide tier-1 troubleshooting support for Tableau Desktop and Server issues while documenting solutions and maintaining knowledge base for common aerospace analytics platform challenges and resolutions.
